pages.text: The Sigil of Heavenly Wrath channels the power of blood magic to smite enemies from above. When activated, all hostile entities within a 16-block radius are forcibly levitated into the air before being dropped to suffer crushing fall damage.
Right-click to activate the sigil. All enemies within 16 blocks (except the user) will be lifted into the air for 2 seconds before plummeting back down.$(br2)LP Cost: 1000 LP

pages.title: Advanced Mechanics
pages.text: Flying entities or those already high in the air receive enhanced downward velocity based on their height from the ground. For every 5 blocks of height, an additional -0.5 velocity is applied, making the sigil particularly effective against flying foes.$(br2)The base downward velocity is -1.5, with a maximum additional velocity of -3.0.
